title: Woman drives stolen tow truck to gym where she assaults boyfriend, California cops say | Flipboard
text: Woman drives stolen tow truck to gym where she assaults boyfriend, California cops say A woman stole a tow truck in Northern California and drove it to a Planet Fitness where she assaulted her boyfriend, police said. Police chased after … [The Island Packet](/@TheIslandPacket) flipped this story into [Local News](/@theislandpacket/local-news-90qmfqguz)•5h More stories from [Northern California](/topic/northerncalifornia) More stories from [California](/topic/california) [Takeaways from the Supreme Court arguments on Trump’s absolute immunity claims](/topic/california/takeaways-from-the-supreme-court-arguments-on-trump-s-absolute-immunity-claims/f-2cbdf05fc2%2Fkeyt.com) By John Fritze, Tierney Sneed and Marshall Cohen, CNN (CNN) — The Supreme Court appeared ready to reject former President Donald Trump’s claims of … [USC cancels 2024 commencement ceremony](/topic/california/usc-cancels-2024-commencement-ceremony/f-592d6fa930%2Fcbsnews.com) University of Southern California announced it will be canceling its main graduation ceremony planned for May 10, 2024, due to "new safety … [New York appeals court overturns Harvey Weinstein’s 2020 rape conviction from landmark #MeToo trial](/topic/california/new-york-appeals-court-overturns-harvey-weinstein-s-2020-rape-conviction-from-la/a-5MUHMyKQTeeHFgJdYt3wvQ%3Aa%3A3483431165-665d2313f7%2Fflipboard.com) New York’s highest court on Thursday overturned Harvey Weinstein’s 2020 rape conviction, finding the judge at the landmark #MeToo trial prejudiced the ex-movie mogul with "egregious" improper rulings, including a decision to let women testify about allegations that weren’t part of the case.
